name: Five Knights In France
description:
France is overcome by a revolution! Marie Antoinette hopes she can bake a cake to calm down the angry knights in her castle. Can she delay the inevitable fate of the guillotine?

How to play:

Sneak around the castle and gather ingredients to make a cake. Make sure to avoid the searchlights of the knights! When you’ve collected everything, head to the kitchen. Can you survive 5 nights with 5 knights?

Music, art, and design all made during the jam.

Bug fixes: 

-Removed an accidentally duplicated manager that was causing many game-breaking issues, such as level skipping and enemy behavior.

-Fixed an issue with double-tapping the action button that would crash the game.

-Removed unintentional invisible enemy

We are still trying to get HTML5 to work properly. Until then, thank you for downloading and playing our game!
